content: > there s nothing sweeter than a little girl wearing a pretty crochet dress the variety of colors in the multi yarn forms the pattern of the skirt **sizes ** directions are for 9-12 months changes for 18 and 24 months are in parentheses finished chest measurement 19 20½ 22½ **supplies ** red heart® soft baby art 705 1½ 1¾ 2 ounces no 7725 pinkie ca and 5½ 6¼ 7 ounces no 7959 giggle cb additional color options no 7624 lime ca and no 7043 tootsie print cb no 7822 sky blue ca and no 7940 cuddles print cb crochet hooks 4mm \ us g-6 and 5mm \ us h-8 yarn needle 4 snap sets sewing needle and thread **gauge ** 18 sts = 4 24 row = 4 in single_crochet with smaller hook 19 sts = 4 21 row = 4 in skirt pat with larger hook
